Cheap as hell. Busy as hell. Worth every bit of hassle. Just snag yourself a small place to put your glass and dig in to the amazingness.Try the morcilla (blood sausage) sandwich. Load it up with the mustard and tomato sauces. Drink a ton of cava.You won't be disappointed. But you might have someone spill a bunch of cava on your shoes. It'll wash out.
